contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of January, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED. To the extent the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief requests extraordinary relief, it is DENIED. To the extent the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief requests mandamus relief, it is GRANTED. The common pleas court is DIRECTED to adjudicate Petitioner’s pending petition within 90 days.
